globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https://*.google.com https://*.googleapis.com https://appleid.cdn-apple.com https://accounts.google.com https://js.stripe.com https://checkout.stripe.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.google.com https://*.googleapis.com https://appleid.cdn-apple.com https://accounts.google.com https://js.stripe.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://accounts.google.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data: https:; frame-src https://checkout.stripe.com https://js.stripe.com https://accounts.google.com https://appleid.apple.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.google.com https://*.googleapis.com https://appleid.apple.com https://api.stripe.com;
